home.openapp: This will open the desktop application in your browser.

titles.supportedLocationNews: Which news sources from which countries are supported?

qanda.whydes: Taiwan news mostly came from China-controlled / China-official media or from reporters who uses inappropriate content to farm clicks and engragement. Or just made up news by the reporters as the Taiwan's NCC doesn't give a shit about the fake news they are promoting as they think it doesn't matter, this platform is a wake up call to the NCC to start to moderate news media corporations that do fake news.
qanda.howdes: We use web scraping to search for the latest news, and store it into the system's cache for people to access. This saves server loading time.
qanda.supportedLocationNews: We will only support Taiwan news, if your country has Line today, you can fork this project and change some of the scraping systems.
qanda.userData: We handle your account and password in a secure way, with two encryption methods, one during transit to the server (and also SQL injecton), one saving to the database. For other user data, it is currently NOT end-to-end encrypted, like your AI chat history, your stars, and your name & email. In the near future, we will add E2E encryption (and I can also pratice).
qanda.mobileApp: I will make a application using React Native in the future, but for now, mobile is not supported.

description.find: You can easily find the same topic from different news sources.
description.interface: Use a desktop like interface, the one that you already got used to.
description.documentation: We provide a documentation for you to learn how to use the app.
description.opensource: This platform is open source! minus the database part, but I'm going to try!
description.apis: We use api's that are made via reverse engineering.

error: Oops! You can not use this resoure before logging in.
systemerror: Oh cool, you found an error, please contact [at]hwtw on Discord, and I can **try** to fix it

settings.loginmessage: We will create a account for you if you don't have one.

popuptext.logout: Are you sure you want to logout?
popuptext.delete: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete your account and remove your data from our servers.

content.checkweirdkeywords: This tool check if the news title has weird 18+ content.
content.noadlinetoday: Provides free, no ads Line today.

bulletpoints.1: 1. Taiwan's news network is really shit, either they have a bunch of stupid opinions, or just news that are not appropriate for kids
bulletpoints.2: 2. This website's goal is to everyone see news a bit easier, and can also compare them.

news.opennewwindow: This will open a new window
news.articleopenpart1: This will open a open a new window about this new org
